entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 06:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Dewpoint: -2.0°C
Wind: WSW 28 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 60 gusting to 80 near midnight then southeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning then west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023
